metadata.Title: CVE-2018-17438 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: A SIGFPE signal is raised in the function H5D__select_io() of H5Dselect.c in the HDF HDF5 through 1.10.3 library during an attempted parse of a crafted HDF file, because of incorrect protection against division by zero. It could allow a remote denial of service attack.

criterions.comment: hdf5 package in impish is affected and needs fixing.
